pr_title: [HUDI-1450] [RFC-15] Use metadata table for listing in HoodieROTablePathFilter

timeline.bodyText: minor: these seen to be duplicated from metadata code. If there is a simple way of moving them to a common class and accessing from there, that would be better.
timeline.author: prashantwason

replies.bodyText: I have moved the HoodieMetadataConfig class to hudi-common.
replies.author: umehrot2

timeline.bodyText: This default can be true as within HoodieTableMetadata - If the metadata table does not exist, RPC calls are used to retrieve file listings from the file system.
timeline.author: prashantwason

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. I introduced a true default for the readers, but just a but concerned about the additional overhead this introduces in the regular (non metadata table) hudi path, as it would keep checking for the metadata folder and call getFileStatus() and then fail. This can be an overhead for S3.
replies.author: umehrot2
